name: Aurum (Alleboi)
description:
A game about a Creeper who wants revenge on Steve.

There is a bug where when you begin the game the sound is at 0,

It does not matter much because there is not much sound but you need to first go to settings.

At the Steve boss fight it might happen that the movement state of the previous boss fight is loaded so the pathfinding will be messed up.

In computer screens bigger than 1920 x 1080p the screen wrap will not work.
